packageJSON.name: fbtool
packageJSON.description: A tool to do things with messenger that you normally can't.

releases.name: The Bot Update
The Creepy Preemptive Update
releases.body:
Added a feature that automatically sends "hello!" when anyone starts typing a message. This only occurs once per thread to stop it from spamming "hello!" whenever someone starts typing.

There is as much usefulness to this feature as there is in any of the other features: very little.

releases.name: The Rave Update
releases.body:
Now you can start your own rave party @ 1Hz.

Have fun with this one.

releases.name: The Thousand Threads Hotfix
releases.body: Program now loads 1000 threads, not just 10.

releases.name: The Thread List Update
releases.body:
# The Thread List Update
- Added a sidebar of threads
  - Loads 1000 threads
  - Clickable!

Also note that windows downloads are now in more friendly zip files.

releases.name: The Regex Update
releases.body:
# The Regex Update
- Added regex match/response feature
  - Put a valid [Regular Expression](http://regexr.com/) in the `/ regex /` box and a match (using $[n] for capture groups) in the match box and press the [listen] button.
  - The app will respond to any incoming message that matches the regex, and respond with the replacement text.
- Cleaned up a bit

releases.name: The Closure Update
releases.body:
# The Closure Update

There's now a close button. Who would have guessed.

releases.name: Version 1.0.0
releases.body:
# Version 1.0.0

## Features:
- Log in and select thread
  - by ID
  - by searching a name of a 1-on-1 convo
- Change:
  - Thread colour (to an unrestricted hex colour!)
  - Nicknames
  - Emoji
- Send
  - A message `n` times
  - A random meme from [imgur](http://imgur.com/t/memes)
  - A random cute pic from [/r/aww](http://reddit.com/r/aww)

It also has one of those great borderless windows (but no close button ) and is entirely in consolas!
